mapper.sql: t.id, t.name, t.parent_id, t.parent_ids, t.parent_id AS parent_id, p.name AS parent_name, t.remarks, t.create_by AS 'createBy.id', t.create_date, t.update_by AS 'updateBy.id', t.update_date, t.del_flag, (select count(*) from test_tree s WHERE s.parent_id=t.id) as hasChildren
LEFT JOIN test_tree p ON p.id = t.parent_id
mapper.update: update test_tree set parent_ids= CONCAT(#{newParentIds},substring(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1)) where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
mapper.delete: delete from test_tree where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
